languages.text: "Ты дорожишь долгой жизнью, но она пуста. Потому ты нетверда в своих путях, а я ступаю одной нитью. За отведенный мне миг я могу свершить больше, чем ты — за столетия".

"You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."
languages.original_text: "Ты дорожишь долгой жизнью, но она пуста. Потому ты нетверда в своих путях, а я ступаю одной нитью. За отведенный мне миг я могу свершить больше, чем ты — за столетия".

traits.locale_text: "You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your paths while I walk along a single thread. I can do more in the moment that I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

"You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your paths while I walk along a single thread. I can do more in the moment that I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

"You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in any moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

"You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in any moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

"You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

languages.text: "Ihr schätzt Euer langes Leben, doch es ist hohl und leer. Darum wankt Ihr weiter auf Euren vielen Pfaden, während ich festen Schrittes einem einzigen Faden folge. Ich kann in dem Augenblick, der mir geschenkt wurde, mehr erreichen als Ihr in Jahrhunderten."
languages.original_text: "You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr schätzt Euer langes Leben, doch es ist hohl und leer. Darum wankt Ihr weiter auf Euren vielen Pfaden, während ich festen Schrittes einem einzigen Faden folge. Ich kann in dem Augenblick, der mir geschenkt wurde, mehr erreichen als Ihr in Jahrhunderten."

languages.text: « Vous tenez plus que tout à votre longévité, mais vous êtes aveugle à la vacuité de votre existence. Voilà pourquoi vous hésitez entre tant de voies quand je marche fidèlement sur un seul et même fil. J'accomplirai bien plus dans le bref délai qui m'est imparti que vous en l'espace de plusieurs siècles. »
languages.original_text: "You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

traits.locale_text: « Vous tenez plus que tout à votre longévité, mais vous êtes aveugle à la vacuité de votre existence. Voilà pourquoi vous hésitez entre tant de voies quand je marche fidèlement sur un seul et même fil. J'accomplirai bien plus dans le bref délai qui m'est imparti que vous en l'espace de plusieurs siècles. »

languages.text: «Y tu vida es tan larga como vacua. Por eso flaqueas en numerosas sendas mientras yo recorro un solo hilo con paso firme. En mi breve existencia, puedo lograr más que tú a lo largo de los siglos».
languages.original_text: "You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

traits.locale_text: «Y tu vida es tan larga como vacua. Por eso flaqueas en numerosas sendas mientras yo recorro un solo hilo con paso firme. En mi breve existencia, puedo lograr más que tú a lo largo de los siglos».

languages.text: 「あなたは長く生きることを大切にしているが、それは空虚なものだ。私が一本の糸に沿って確実に歩んでいるのに対して、あなた方は、いくつもの道をふらふらと歩いている。私は与えられた瞬間に、あなた方が何世紀もかけて成し遂げられる以上のことを成し遂げることができる」
languages.original_text: "You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは長く生きることを大切にしているが、それは空虚なものだ。私が一本の糸に沿って確実に歩んでいるのに対して、あなた方は、いくつもの道をふらふらと歩いている。私は与えられた瞬間に、あなた方が何世紀もかけて成し遂げられる以上のことを成し遂げることができる」

languages.text: “你很珍惜你的寿命，但你的生命空洞无物。正因如此，你在许多条道路之间摇摆不定，而我却能坚定不移地沿着一条路走到底。我此时此刻能做的事情，比你在几百年间能做的还要多。”
languages.original_text: "You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

traits.locale_text: “你很珍惜你的寿命，但你的生命空洞无物。正因如此，你在许多条道路之间摇摆不定，而我却能坚定不移地沿着一条路走到底。我此时此刻能做的事情，比你在几百年间能做的还要多。”

languages.original_text: "You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."

languages.text: "Uzun ömrüne çok değer veriyorsun ancak onu boşa harcıyorsun. İşte bu nedenle yürüdüğün nice yolda bocalıyorsun. Bense tek bir iplik üzerinden emin adımlarla ilerliyorum. Bu hayatta senin asırlar boyunca başarabileceklerinden çok daha fazlasını yapabilirim."
languages.original_text: "You treasure your long life, but it is hollow. This is why you waver on your many paths while I walk surely along a single thread. I can do more in the moment I have been given than you can achieve in centuries."
